Please refer to rental car options below and call us to discuss other car categories 8 Day/7 Night The Classic Scotland, Self-Drive Explore the breathtaking landscapes, iconic lochs and old towns of Scotland. Visit many well known castles and monuments including Edinburgh Castle, Stirling Castle, the Wallace Monument, Inveraray Castle and Eilean Donan Castle. Stop at Loch Lomond, the largest lake in Great Britain and try to see the elusive 'Nessie' at Loch Ness. Experience the Isle of Skye the largest and one of the most scenic of the Hebridean Islands. Explore the home of golf in St Andrews, before discovering Edinburgh.
